description:
Happy New Year To All Of You.

==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE ADVANCE CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Writing MapReduce Program

Familiarize with Combiner & Partitioners,Sorting & Searching large data sets and

Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency (TF- IDF)

Details of Indexing data and inverted Index.
title: Apache Hadoop for Developers - Advance
